item.title: WordPress on Google Cloud Platform
item.description: I am going over hosting WordPress on Google Cloud Platform in this article. This is a step by step guide on how to set up and host a WordPress website using a fresh installation.

item.title: Introduction to Google Cloud Platform
item.description: This is an Introduction to Google Cloud Platform and goes over creating your first project and virtual machine. This walkthrough is for beginners that are just getting started with Google Cloud.

item.title: Create Swap file on Cloud VM (AWS, GCloud, or Azure)
item.description: Use the commands below to create swap file on a micro instance with a Linux operating system. This creates a 2GB Swap file to help alleviateÂ low system ram. Consequently, this is great for those using micro instances in the cloud that have under 1 GB of memory.
